Patient taken to the operating room for exploratory laparotomy.
Operative report: Splenectomy and liver repair performed.
Op note documented.

Patient taken back to OR for same operative site complication.
Return to OR for hemorrhage at prior surgical site.
Re-operation performed for same site bleeding.
